div.a: Title 1 - Mrs. Vail, Mrs. Cox, Mrs. Bartlett
I Want My Hat Back - July 26

font.font: For the most current information please visit the

span.font: All use of the Drinkwater playground and equipment during the COVID-19 pandemic is at your own risk.

font.span: The Edna Drinkwater Office is open Monday-Friday from 8:00 a.m. – 1:00 p.m. until further notice.

span.font: The office will not be open during April vacation week.

font.span: Our school number is 338-3430 and messages are checked daily.
You may reach Todd Martin by email at
tmartin@drinkwaterschool.org and Peg Long at plong@drinkwaterschool.org.
Drinkwater students are eligible to receive breakfasts and lunches. If you would like to receive them, please email Kris Chapman at
or call 338-3430 and leave a message. Food boxes must be pre-ordered and you may pick them up on Mondays between 12:00 p.m. and 1:00 p.m. Food boxes will not be available April vacation week.
Teachers are always available by email.
Email addresses are available in the directory on the main page of the website.
Our social worker, Ms. Hawthorne can be reached at
Please do not hesitate to reach out to her for support as needed.
chool nurse, Ms. Loring is also available to provide support. She can be emailed at

b.span: Here are some activities to keep you and your housemates busy and engaged during social distancing:

p.span: • National Gallery of Art, Washington DC
• Reid Park Zoo Lion Cam in Tuscon, AZ
• Ouwehand Park Polar Bear Cubs Rhenen, Netherland
• Cincinnati zoo live FB for kids
• Virtual Tour of the Seattle Aquarium
• Google Maps street view will allow you to visit almost any destination around the world. Check out this view from Pompei.
• Visit the Great Wall of China
• Take a live look at Colonial Williamsburg.
• Go on a virtual field trip to Ellis Island.
• Berlin Philharmonic (need to redeem voucher on their website by March 31st to have access to their digital concert hall)

a.title: Online Tours | Louvre Museum | Paris
a.span: Attached link: Online Tours | Louvre Museum | Paris. Click to open in new tab.

p.span: Visit the museum's exhibition rooms and galleries, contemplate the façades of the Louvre... Come along on a virtual tour and enjoy the view, thanks to the sponsorship of Shiseido.
